issue.title: [CF 1116] please add black & white mod of icon.
issue.body:

2.animation :  icon slide function

thank you, i used tmw very well

IMPORTANT: If your issue is only occurring with a specific icon, include an export string of the icon in this ticket. Similarly, if the issue involves an entire group or an entire profile, include the entire export string of the group or profile.

To get an export string, open the icon editor, and click button labeled "Import/Export/Backup". Select the "To string" option for the appropriate export type for your issue, and then press CTRL+C to copy it to your clipboard.

comments.body:
1. This already exists - check the color settings in TMW's main options
  2. I don't know what this means. Please be more specific about how this would look and what the behavior would be.

> Posted by CurseForge user Cybeloras

@Cybeloras: Go

icon slide mean icon move 810 pixel main location from top or bottom, right or left I(or we) just select preset. notification -> animation -> show etc... -> this it just effect animation.

Edited May 6, 2015

> Posted by CurseForge user bolise

Something like that wouldn't work in TMW. An icon's position within its group is an integral part of TMW, and moving it far outside the group like that just doesn't fit the vision for TMW. Sorry.


> Posted by CurseForge user Cybeloras
